header.title: Meghan Markle snub: Kate Middleton beats Meghan in major popularity poll
header.subtitle: MEGHAN MARKLE and Kate, Duchess of Cambridge have both married into the Royal Family and become full-worthy members of one the world’s most families, but a new poll has now revealed Kate is the most popular of the two.
header.postText: Kate, Duchess of Cambridge has been voted more popular than royal sister-in-law Meghan Markle.', 'According to a national survey by Tatler the Duchess of Cambridge are preferred by a big majority of the British public.', 'Tatler reports than 44 percent prefer Kate to Meghan, compared to 11 percent who disagreed and a further 12 percent who said they did not know.', 'The fashion and lifestyle magazine also revealed that of some of the 2,000 British adults surveyed, 55 percent agreed Meghan had been good for the Royal Family while 45 percent disagreed.', 'This isn’t the first time the Duchess of Cambridge has be pitted against than the wife of Prince Harry in a poll.', 'In an annual YouGov poll published in August Kate was voted a more popular member of the British Royal Family than Meghan.', 'It is the second year in a row the opinion poll has ranked the Duchess of Cambridge higher than the Duchess of Sussex.', 'The YouGov research was carried out between June 2018 and June 2019, with 9,000 people interviewed.', 'Of the participants, 64 percent said they had a positive opinion of Kate while just 10 percent disliked Prince William’s wife.', 'However, only 49 percent of participants regarded Meghan favourably and 16 percent had a negative opinion.', 'The reason Kate may be ranked more popular than Meghan by the public could be due to her being a member of the family longer.', 'Kate married Prince William in 2011 while Meghan only became a royal in 2018 when she tied the knot Prince Harry.', 'The Duchess of Cambridge is also preparing for her role as a future Queen Consort and is taking on more engagements than ever.', 'Kate and William also have more followers on social media than Harry and Meghan.', 'On Instagram the Cambridges’ official account has 10.2million followers while the Sussexes’ has 9.7million.', 'Tatler also asked the 2,000 British adults other questions about Meghan.', 'The survey also found:', '', 'ComRes surveyed 2,016 British adults on 6-8 September 2019.', 'Data were weighted to be demographically representative of all GB adults.', 'ComRes is a member of the British Polling Council and abides by its rules.', 'The 310th Anniversary December Issue of Tatler is available on newsstands and via digital download on Thursday, October 31.

commentThread.commentText: Kate comes from a stable family and has been given lots of support from them.  She doesn't fall out with them when they have fulfilled their usefulness. Kate doesn't go through staff like a dose of salts. Kate doesn't preach to us, then do the total opposite. Kate doesn't say we don't ask how she is. MM has moaned we have not asked how she is, YET SHE has never asked how her Father is after he suffered a heart attack. Kate doesn't give a speech at a charity event and talk purely about herself!  In short , Kate is not hypocritical and self absorbed!

replies.commentText: And Kate isn't a narcissist.  Why is it that the DE is deleting completely innocuous yet negative comments repeatedly ? Perhaps they 're afraid of being sued by the self-absorbed, unedifying pair, as other tabloid rags are.

commentThread.commentText: Sussex PR in action.  Tatler poll?  Most people will just laugh at this rubbish
I dare you to put out a poll yourself Express, and I'll bet the results will be completely different. Rachel Meghan is NOT liked, but her PR team are doing overwork
Kate works as a part of the team ,for the good of the whole . She is not outspoken but conveys her thoughts and beliefs by deed.

Of course Kate won -   she knows how to behave like a Royal - unfortunately MEAGAIN does not have a clue.  And if Harry thought that trip to Africa to walk in Diana's footsteps would help him heal he obviously does not have much sense.   That has just reopened all hurt he feels.  He is a fool.

replies.commentText: Meghan is fanning the flames of Diana's demise and the press attention with Harry. If she says she's worried about it, he'll give her anything she wants and her emotional blackmail will be missed by him because all he's doing is mistakenly thinking that his wife will fall victim to what Diana did. This may well be the case because both Diana and Meghan American PR firm court the press. Meghan's problem is that while the press have given her positive coverage, the public can see right through her and dislike her. I for one am suspicious of Tatler's poll. Who did they ask 20 year olds with no knowledge of how a royal should be?

Sometimes it is time to admit you cannot do the job and resign ....  not sure they could be happy anywhere to be honest they are just 2 miserable moaners.

Time Harry and MeMe stopped the PR  nonsense and either accept their position or resign and move  to LA La Land which seems better suited to the celebrity life style Me Me craves.

I just saw Catherine speaking about the Pakistan visit to an interviewer in the video. What I like about her is that she isn't so 'practiced' in her speaking, there's always a  hint of nervousness but she gets through it. Keep going Catherine your voice is good, let's hear more of it!

You're right when Catherine speaks I listen, when MM speaks I roll my eyes.

commentThread.commentText: Of course Catherine is more popular.  Since marrying William she hasn’t put a foot wrong whereas Meghan keeps opening her mouth and jumping in feet first.
let's be right at the present time Rose West would be more popular than Spendalot Sparkle in this Country.
It's a no brainer !  Kate is going to be Queen one day and the other is a sweet little celebrity !!!
Well, the good news for Harry is that his next wife will likely be more popular, as it would quite hard to be less so than the current one.
